title: Facebook Data Deletion Instructions
subtitle: How to remove your data
intro: matbakh.app uses Facebook Login to provide you with easy authentication. Your personal data is managed in compliance with GDPR regulations.
compliance: In accordance with Facebook guidelines, we provide you with data deletion instructions here.
stepsTitle: How to delete your connection to matbakh.app:

step1.title: Log in to Facebook
step1.description: Sign in to your Facebook account

step3.title: Open Apps and Websites
step3.description: Select "Apps and Websites" from the left menu

step4.title: Find matbakh.app
step4.description: Look for "matbakh app – visibility for hospitality" in the list

step5.title: Remove Connection
step5.description: Click "Remove" next to the app name

step6.title: Confirm
step6.description: Check "Delete all data received from the app" and confirm

alternativeText: If you need assistance, contact us:
subject: Subject: "Facebook Login Data Deletion"
responseTime: We will delete your data within 48 hours of your request.
deletedData: Your name and email address from our system
All profile data linked to your Facebook login
note: Note: Your visibility analytics and business data will remain but will be anonymized.
